00032 class EffectNoise : public BlockGenerator {
00033 
00034  public:
00035    EffectNoise() {
00036       SetEffectFlags(BUILTIN_EFFECT | INSERT_EFFECT);
00037       noiseType = 0;
00038       noiseAmplitude = 1.0;
00039    }
00040    virtual bool Init();
00041 
00042    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00043       return wxString(_("Noise..."));
00044    }
00045 
00046    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00047       std::set<wxString> result;
00048       result.insert(wxT("http://lv2plug.in/ns/lv2core#GeneratorPlugin"));
00049       return result;
00050    }
00051 
00052    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00053       return wxString(wxT("Noise"));
00054    }
00055 
00056    virtual wxString GetEffectDescription() {
00057       return wxString::Format(_("Applied effect: Generate Noise, %.6lf seconds"), mDuration);
00058    }
00059 
00060    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00061       return wxString(_("Generating Noise"));
00062    }
00063 
00064    virtual bool PromptUser();
00065    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00066 
00067    void GenerateBlock(float *data, const WaveTrack &track, sampleCount block);
00068    void Success();
00069 
00070  private:
00071    sampleCount numSamples;
00072    int noiseType;
00073    double noiseAmplitude;
00074 
00075  protected:
00076    virtual bool MakeNoise(float *buffer, sampleCount len, float fs, float amplitude);
00077 
00078  // friendship ...
00079  friend class NoiseDialog;
00080 
00081 };
